short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto refreshes amazon best seller pages if the page is restricted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Best Seller Page Auto Refresher.
This extension automatically recognizes the content of the amazon best seller page. If it detects that the page access is restricted, it will automatically refresh the page content for you to improve the page browsing experience.
